roleset.name: knock out

example.name: passive, one arg
example.text: Anne Burford, the former EPA chief who resigned under fire in 1983 during a flap with Congress, was kayoed [*]in the confrontation, even though she was never charged with official wrondgoing.
example.arg: Anne Burford, the former EPA chief who resigned under fire in 1983 during a flap with Congress,
even though she was never charged with official wrondgoing.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Dent had kayoed him with one punch!

roleset.note: KAYO-V NOTES: could also appear as KO or K.O. (from kayo.01-v)
